name: My Little Pony: Pocket Ponies
summary: In this ridiculously fun arcade game, join Twilight Sparkle and your favorite My Little Pony characters at the School of Friendship! As a new student, you are swept away in the first, awesome Pocket Pony Championship! Face-off against masters, students and teachers in thrilling arcade challenges using the unique Pocket Ponies figurines. Collect them all to make your perfect team!
